Home Libraries People FAQ More

connect

Establishes a socket connection by trying each endpoint in a sequence. 

template<
    typename Protocol,
    typename SocketService,
    typename Iterator>
Iterator connect(
    basic_socket< Protocol, SocketService > & s,
    Iterator begin);
  » more...
